name: Choo-Charles As An Isometric Turret Defense Game
name_original: Choo-Charles As An Isometric Turret Defense Game
description:
TURNING CHOO CHOO CHARLES Into An ISOMETRIC TURRET DEFENSE  Game In 7 DAYS

This is 'Choo Choo Charles' as an isometric turret defense game, made in just 7 days.  I used Unity 2D to make it happen, and I'll be sharing the full development on YouTube. 

YouTube : Mr. Marksman YouTube

Twitter : @Mr.Marksman

Website (Newsletter) : https://mrmarksman.com/ 

TikTok : https://www.tiktok.com/@mrmarksman_
